allow: Bash(for file in index.html gettingStarted.html generate.html archipelago.html patch.html result.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|Archipelago|Archipelago\n About|' "$file")
Bash(for file in templates/archipelago.html templates/generate.html templates/gettingStarted.html templates/index.html templates/patch.html templates/result.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's/Created by the TTYD Randomizer Community/Created by jamesbrq/g' "$file")
